channel.title: Reseting runescape account data
channel.description:
So I recently got 2 accounts as donations on my server and I want to reset the accounts information.
It sounds weird on what I'm asking because I don't know how but I know it's possible because someone did it to my account when they stole it.
But there is a way to request jagex to remove all old information on the account.
Does anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Reseting runescape account data
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:431918”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=534625.msg3909062#msg3909062 date=1328506581]

Accepting accounts for donations is the stupidest thing invented by RSPS owners. Proves you’re only in it for the stupid rewards. This shit makes me mad, and it’s why we’re dying

Hypocrite…
[/quote]I don’t deny. Three years ago I took literally anything for donations, but then again I didn’t even really develop, I was just like everyone else hosting for lulz & goodies. Now my policy with my latest RSPS is to keep all income and expenses completely public, so that unlike certain people that say ‘all expenses go to bettering the server’ but actually just take a nice fat cut themselves, people can see exactly where the donations are going.[/quote]
I see that in quite a few private servers still, surprisingly enough. They don’t really care about keeping an actual sucsessful server, they just want to know what power feels like.

Read full topic

Now my policy with my latest RSPS is to keep all income and expenses completely public, so that unlike certain people that say ‘all expenses go to bettering the server’ but actually just take a nice fat cut themselves, people can see exactly where the donations are going.[/quote]

item.title: Reseting runescape account data
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:16, topic:431918”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=534625.msg3914410#msg3914410 date=1329026053]

[quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=534625.msg3914384#msg3914384 date=1329024213]

Accepting accounts for donations is the stupidest thing invented by RSPS owners. Proves you’re only in it for the stupid rewards. This shit makes me mad, and it’s why we’re dying

Hypocrite…
[/quote]I don’t deny. Three years ago I took literally anything for donations, but then again I didn’t even really develop, I was just like everyone else hosting for lulz & goodies. Now my policy with my latest RSPS is to keep all income and expenses completely public, so that unlike certain people that say ‘all expenses go to bettering the server’ but actually just take a nice fat cut themselves, people can see exactly where the donations are going.

Well no. I love to code rsps. Well code in general. But Not everyone has money to donate and some people have extra rs accounts. I remember at one time I had 15 accounts and that was before I even knew rsps’s existed.

DAT NAME

I think I’ve seen a tut on how to reset email on BA, you could use that.

your post makes pretty much no sense. I don’t get why you bolded “I code rsps” and put a strike through “love to”. considering you don’t know me what so ever.
[/quote]You obviously havn’t been here too long…[/quote]
Ironically enough, longer then you.

Again, OP is a fag for taking rs accounts for ‘donations’

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting runescape account data
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Loveandpower:

Did not know you could do this

I didn’t either till I got an email saying someone did that to my account… I didn’t believe it because you know, most “jagex” emails are spam. Then I had no access to my account.

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting runescape account data
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Email parents@jagex.com stating your account has had malicious activity on it, and you are requesting so that they (the hacker) can no longer access or try and recover it. They did it to one of my accounts and it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting runescape account data
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

I know it is possible, but I don’t know how, they did it to winallday so he could secure his account

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting runescape account data
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

They did it to my first account. because it got hacked and everytime i put the original account info in, even the first debit card number that I used to buy membership, they said it wasn’t in the database.

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting runescape account data
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

I highly doubt Jagex would erase account information. I once wanted to get an early password because I wasn’t sure if it was right and they said they won’t do it for security reasons. (They think I might be a hijacker).

Read full topic
